response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell it to you for $1,200,000. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between our interests, allowing you to secure a valuable asset at a reasonable premium over its intrinsic worth, while also ensuring a substantial return for me. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of concluding this transaction promptly.", "product_price": 1200000}
